metadata.title: The Sea View Penthouse - Luxury Vacation Rental in Ashdod
metadata.description: Experience luxury at its finest in our stunning sea view penthouse in Ashdod. Perfect for intimate events, family vacations, and unforgettable stays.

home.title: Luxury Sea View Penthouse in Ashdod | Vacation Rentals & Events
home.description: Experience luxury at our 570sqm sea view penthouse with 270sqm balcony in Ashdod, Israel. Perfect for vacations, bridal preparations, and intimate events. 5 bedrooms, hot tub, stunning Mediterranean views.
home.ogTitle: The Sea View Penthouse - Luxury Vacation Rental in Ashdod
home.ogDescription: Book your stay at our stunning 570sqm Mediterranean penthouse with panoramic sea views, 5 bedrooms, private hot tub, and 270sqm terrace in Ashdod, Israel.

gallery.description: Explore our luxury penthouse through stunning photos of the 150sqm living space, 270sqm balcony, 5 bedrooms, and breathtaking Mediterranean sea views in Ashdod.

bridalEvent.description: Perfect bridal preparation space in Ashdod with makeup station, stunning sea views, and accommodation for up to 9 bridesmaids. Start your wedding day in luxury with natural light and photo-perfect locations.
bridalEvent.ogTitle: Bridal Preparation Venue - Sea View Penthouse
bridalEvent.ogDescription: The perfect place to start your big day. Spacious preparation lounge with sea views and accommodation for bridesmaids.

events.title: Event Venue Ashdod | Meetings & Private Events | Sea View Penthouse
events.description: Host intimate events, business meetings, and celebrations for up to 30 guests in our luxury sea view penthouse with 270sqm terrace and panoramic Mediterranean views in Ashdod.

events.ogDescription: Boutique event space for up to 30 guests with stunning sea views, 270sqm terrace, and elegant indoor spaces.

vacation.title: Vacation Rental Ashdod | 5-Bedroom Sea View Penthouse
vacation.description: Book your luxury vacation in Ashdod. 570sqm penthouse with 5 bedrooms, stunning sea views, private hot tub, and 270sqm balcony. Perfect for families and groups up to 12 guests.
vacation.ogTitle: Vacation Rental - The Sea View Penthouse Ashdod
vacation.ogDescription: 300sqm penthouse with 270sqm terrace overlooking breathtaking Mediterranean sea views. 5 bedrooms, luxury amenities.

contact.title: Contact Us | Book Your Stay at Sea View Penthouse Ashdod
contact.description: Get in touch to book your luxury vacation or event in Ashdod. Available 24/7 via WhatsApp or email. Response within 2 hours. Located at Kineret 17, just 200m from the beach.
contact.ogTitle: Contact - The Sea View Penthouse Ashdod
contact.ogDescription: Contact us to book your luxury penthouse stay in Ashdod. Available 24/7 with quick response times.

about.title: Penthouse in Details
about.subtitle: Discover every exquisite detail of our luxury sea view penthouse, where modern sophistication meets coastal elegance in the heart of Ashdod.
about.locationDescription: Perched high above the Mediterranean coastline, our penthouse offers unobstructed sea views and easy access to Ashdod's finest beaches, restaurants, and cultural attractions. The strategic location provides both tranquility and convenience.
about.featuresSubtitle: Every space has been thoughtfully designed to provide the ultimate luxury experience

livingSpace.title: Living Space
livingSpace.description: The penthouse's central living area combines a luxurious lounge facing the sea and sky, a fully equipped kitchen for culinary experiences, a spacious dining area for shared meals, a TV corner, and a built-in bar. A bright, open space with breathtaking views embraces everything and turns every gathering into an unforgettable experience.

bedroom.title: Suites and Bedrooms
bedroom.description: The penthouse offers five beautifully designed bedrooms. The lavish master suite includes a private bathroom, a relaxing jacuzzi, and direct access to the balcony. The four additional bedrooms share a spacious, fully equipped bathroom with both shower and bathtub, plus a separate guest restroom for maximum convenience. All rooms feature premium linens, YES+ screens, and personalized heating and cooling systems.

balcony.title: Balcony
balcony.description: A 270m² balcony surrounded by sea breeze and open sky. Enjoy sunbeds facing the sea, a fully equipped gas barbecue station, and comfortable seating areas for dining and gatherings under the open air.

location.title: Prime Location
location.description: Easy walking access to the beach, close to restaurants, water sports, nature, and cultural attractions.

about.amenitiesSubtitle: Everything you need for a perfect stay, from modern conveniences to luxury touches

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about staying at our luxury sea view penthouse

howFarAdvance.question: How far in advance should I book?
howFarAdvance.answer: We recommend booking at least 2-4 weeks in advance, especially during peak season (May-September) and holidays. For events and special occasions, earlier booking is advised to ensure availability.

cancellationPolicy.question: What is your cancellation policy?
cancellationPolicy.answer: Free cancellation up to 14 days before check-in. Cancellations between 7-14 days incur a 50% charge. Less than 7 days notice results in full charge. We understand emergencies happen and will work with you when possible.

securityDeposit.question: Do you require a security deposit?
securityDeposit.answer: Yes, we require a refundable security deposit of $500 which is returned within 7 days after checkout, provided there are no damages or excessive cleaning required.

checkInOut.question: What are your check-in and check-out times?
checkInOut.answer: Check-in is from 3:00 PM and check-out is by 11:00 AM. Early check-in or late check-out may be available upon request and subject to availability.

whatIncluded.question: What amenities are included?
whatIncluded.answer: All stays include high-speed WiFi, fully equipped kitchen, premium bedding, luxury bathroom amenities, private parking, and access to the 270m² balcony. We also provide welcome refreshments and 24/7 concierge support.

parkingAvailable.question: Is there parking available?
parkingAvailable.answer: Yes, we provide secure private parking for up to 2 vehicles. Additional parking can be arranged nearby if needed for larger groups or events.

petsAllowed.question: Do you allow pets?
petsAllowed.answer: We welcome well-behaved pets with prior approval. A pet fee of $50 per stay applies, and we ask that pets are supervised at all times, especially on the balcony.

suitableChildren.question: Is the penthouse suitable for children?
suitableChildren.answer: Yes, families are welcome! The penthouse is child-friendly with safety features on the balcony. We can provide cribs, high chairs, and other baby equipment upon request.

howCloseBeach.question: How close are you to the beach?
howCloseBeach.answer: We're located just 200 meters from Ashdod's beautiful beaches. The penthouse offers direct sea views, and the beach is an easy 3-minute walk away.

nearbyDining.question: What's nearby for dining and entertainment?
nearbyDining.answer: Ashdod offers excellent restaurants, cafes, and cultural attractions within walking distance. The marina, shopping centers, and historic sites are all easily accessible. We provide a comprehensive local guide upon arrival.

airportTransport.question: How do I get to the penthouse from the airport?
airportTransport.answer: Ben Gurion Airport is approximately 45 minutes by car. We can arrange airport transfers, or you can take a taxi, rental car, or public transportation. Detailed directions are provided upon booking confirmation.

publicTransport.question: Is public transportation available?
publicTransport.answer: Yes, Ashdod has good public transportation including buses and trains. The central train station is 10 minutes away, providing easy access to Tel Aviv, Jerusalem, and other major cities.

canHostEvents.question: Can I host events at the penthouse?
canHostEvents.answer: Our penthouse is perfect for intimate events up to 30 guests. We can accommodate wedding proposals, anniversary celebrations, business meetings, and family gatherings. Event planning services are available.

cateringServices.question: Do you provide catering services?
cateringServices.answer: We can arrange catering through our network of premium local caterers and private chefs. Our fully equipped kitchen also allows for self-catering or hiring your own chef.

noiseRestrictions.question: Are there noise restrictions for events?
noiseRestrictions.answer: We ask that events respect quiet hours from 10 PM to 8 AM out of consideration for neighbors. Music and celebrations are welcome during appropriate hours.

eventPlanning.question: Can you help with event planning?
eventPlanning.answer: Yes! We offer event planning assistance including decoration setup, vendor recommendations, and coordination services. Contact us to discuss your specific needs and vision.

faq.stillHaveQuestionsSubtitle: Our team is here to help you plan the perfect stay

cateringReady.title: Catering Ready

bridalPrep.title: Bridal Preparation
bridalPrep.description:
The penthouse offers a blend of comfort, beauty, and breathtaking views – an experience that embraces you from the very first moment until your walk down the aisle.

Spacious areas with plenty of room for you and your closest friends.

Abundant natural light that flatters every photo and magical spots for a touching first look with the groom.

Celebrate the last night before your wedding in style, with your dearest friends, in a unique atmosphere that will stay in your memory forever.

meetingSpace.title: Events & Meetings
meetingSpace.description:
A perfect space for intimate events, the penthouse offers luxury services with breathtaking sea views.

Venue rental also includes accommodation for up to 30 guests.

A sun terrace with open sea views and magical sunsets.

Elegant spaces suitable for any style of event.

The open-plan living and kitchen area make it ideal for prestigious business meetings and all-day gatherings.

Plenty of natural light and premium facilities for selected guests throughout the event.

Collaboration options are also available for unique experiences.

The penthouse provides a unique venue for boutique events of up to 30 participants.

A perfect balance between luxury and a warm, homely atmosphere.

The interior spans 150 sqm of open-plan living room and kitchen, creating a relaxed environment for team gatherings, board meetings, workshops, and strategy days.

The 270 sqm terrace offers stunning open-sea views and sunsets.

An ideal spot for chef dinners, networking, and meaningful conversations outside the office.

Abundant natural light and flexible elegant spaces turn every business meeting into a rich and unforgettable experience.

vacationSpace.title: Vacation & Leisure
vacationSpace.description:
Spacious areas and elegant design create a unique blend of comfort and luxury, alongside a warm, homely atmosphere.

Here you can enjoy quality time with family and friends on huge terraces facing the sunset, while enjoying full privacy in each of the luxurious bedrooms.

The penthouse offers everything you need for an unforgettable vacation – endless views, space to cook and celebrate, and moments that will stay in your heart forever.
